product_name: L'OrealTrue Match Lumi Glotion Natural Glow Bronzing Enhancer
summary: SummaryL'Oréal True Match Lumi Glotion Natural Glow Bronzing Enhancer instantly hydrates and luminizes skin for an all-over, bronzing, natural and fresh glow
details: DetailsBenefitsHighlighting glow lotion instantly hydrates & luminizes skin for an all over, dewy, natural glowMulti-purpose, can be used as a luminous primer, lightweight full face foundation, highlighter, contour & full body luminizerSimilar to a glow drop, Lumi Glotion can be worn alone, under/over makeup, or in combination with your foundationFeaturesFormulated in shades designed to flatter light, medium & deep skin tones with a subtle, barely there shimmer finish for a lit-from-within glowUse alone sweeping over cheekbones, perimeter of forehead & neck and collarbone for a natural bronzed lookFor an added glow, first apply LUMI Glotion all over skin for instant illuminationLayer LUMI Bronze on top, lightly sweeping onto cheeks for added dimension & a bronzed glowItem 2520146How To UseChoose the shade that best matches your skin tone. Apply all-over or to high points of the face.IngredientsMedium: Aqua / Water / Eau, Glycerin, Cyclohexasiloxane, Alcohol Denat., Butyrospermum Parkii Butter / Shea Butter, Dimethicone, Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Polyglyceryl-6 Distearate, Mica, Polysilicone-11, Phenoxyethanol, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Jojoba Esters, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Polyacrylamide, CI 77491 / Iron Oxides, Boron Nitride, Polyglyceryl-3 Beeswax, Cetyl Alcohol, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Adenosine, Disodium Edta, Laureth-7, Sodium Hydroxide, Tin Oxide, Triethoxysilylethyl Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Alumina, Citric Acid.
how_to_use: Choose the shade that best matches your skin tone. Apply all-over or to high points of the face.

reviews.headline: Using for 2 yrs. LOVE IT
reviews.comments: I have acne prone skin and break out with many new products. I'm 57 yo, have uneven skin texture, fine lines blah blah old skin blah. This works beautifully under my laura gellar powder foundation . It blurs my unevenness and I even can wear it alone for a natural glowy look. Its never broken my face out. I look forward to wearing it. Wish it had serum in it to do double duty.

reviews.headline: Good, but not for me
reviews.comments: I love this product but its not for the acne girlies. If you have acne prone sensitive skin this will break you out! It also looks like theres glitter in it ehich kinda makes it look cheaper but wearing it under makeup is beautuful!

reviews.headline: Shimmer face
reviews.comments: I got this as a sample and its terrible. It looks like I applied shimmer highlighter over my entire face and emphasizes all my pores.

reviews.headline: New to me
reviews.comments: This has been around for quite a while, but I finally got around to trying it and I love it. It leaves the skin with such a healthy glow. I used to be into the matte look, but now prefer dewy/glowy. It's comfortable, lightweight and easy to throw on before foundation! A new staple for my routine.

reviews.headline: Don't get the hype
reviews.comments: Okay i dont know if im just not using it right but i DO NOT like this product. It looks sparkly and greasy and it makes my skin look so cakey, im not even wearing foundation! Just enhanced every pore and imperfection on my face to be honest.

reviews.headline: Lovely..!
reviews.comments: I love it..! Underneath foundation and by itself, it looks amazing.

reviews.headline: I used 901 shade
reviews.comments: I probably can alsonuse 902 shade as im sort if fair/light in ither brands. I'm 53yrs old and suoer dry skin and it's lightweight when i dont want to wear a lit if make up.
reviews.nickname: Try it you might love it

reviews.headline: It's ok
reviews.comments: I liked this but im not a huge fan of having really heavy makeup and skincare on my face so it wasnt my favorite but if you dont mind having heavier things on your face like foundation (this is lighter than foundation) then this is the perfect skin tint for you.

reviews.headline: FAV glowy product
reviews.comments: This product gives the most perfect (not greasy) glow. As someone who was oily, acne prone skin its nice to have a product that moisturizes and lets us have "dewy" skin like the influencers without breaking me out. It also has fairly decent coverage for what i was expecting so that was a bonus and it lasted me months(given that i used to only wear it in the summer) but i realized recently that it goes beautifully under higher coverage makeup and doesn't emphasize on any of dry spots or texture.

reviews.headline: FAV glowy product
reviews.comments: This product gives the most perfect (not greasy) glow. As someone who was oily, acne prone skin its nice to have a product that moisturizes and lets us have "dewy" skin like the influencers without breaking me out. It also has fairly decent coverage for what i was expecting so that was a bonus and it lasted me months(given that i used to only wear it in the summer) but i realized recently that it goes beautifully under higher coverage makeup and doesn't emphasize on any of dry spots or texture.

reviews.headline: Love.
reviews.comments: Love this for adding a little color back into my skin after color correcting with green tinted products or tinted moisturizer. This is the first bronzing type products ive every tried and i love it, its super easy to blend into the skin and doesn't look streaky.

reviews.headline: It's OK
reviews.comments: I like that this soaks in quickly and doesn't leave a greasy feel. However, it doesn't wow underneath a foundation; I'll have to try it as a liquid/cream highlighter over my foundation. The glow doesn't come through my medium buildable foundation.

reviews.headline: Great Glow
reviews.comments: I 'm on my 50's with a good skin and I bought this Lumi Glotion a few weeks ago, I love the natural glow. I've received a lot of compliments. I apply my normal moisturizer, followed by a primer and I mix the foundation and the lumi glow. It looks amaizing. I recomend it!

reviews.headline: New version has clumps
reviews.comments: Ive bought at least five bottles of this over the years and have loved it. But the most recent bottle I got has weird clumps in it which Ive never seen before in previous versions. I dont know if I just got a bad bottle or if they reformulated recently, but Im hesitant to buy again. Quality may be going down.

reviews.headline: Absolutely  LOVE this product!
reviews.comments: Sometimes I will use this product alone, other times I will add a foundation with it. Either way, I absolutely love the glow it gives my skin!

reviews.headline: Contains Glitter
reviews.comments: I bought this product to mix with foundation for a more luminous look. Looks good, especially from a distance, but it does noticeably contain glitter. I was hoping for something shiny, but not sparkly. It gets glitter all over my boyfriend.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: This is the best product I have purchased in a long time! Perfect summer glow. My skin has never looked better!

reviews.headline: Bronzed and bonded
reviews.comments: Both my daughter and I wear this and it looks great on us, although our skin tones are slightly different—it matches us perfectly. This bronzer is formulated to complement deeper skin tones and offers a buildable, sun-kissed glow.

reviews.headline: I  like it!
reviews.comments: A little goes a long way. It feels luxurious on my skin and it haven't noticed any breakouts. I love how my skin glows and looks refreshed and radiant. I'm 47 and that's important to me to have radiant skin. It doesn't settle in creases, seems to last long enough. I discovered it from my 21 yo daughter, so that's gives range on how we both love it. I use NARS radiant concealer in AMANDE, which is a perfect match for my skin tone and this pairs well with it to give me a fresh face.

reviews.headline: Feels Great!
reviews.comments: I love the formula, it feels wonderful and smooth on the skin! I would say it feels "buttery" and "silky" and "velvety" on the skin. Very luxurious feeling. Only con is the slight smell, but not strong at all.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I received this complimentary and I AM SO GLAD that I did! The deep color looks amazing on my complexion and provides such a light natural glow. This is highly recommended for the brown skin Queens looking to highlight!

#contest #complimentary #LumiGlow #LOrealParis @Influenster @LOrealMakeup
faceoff_positive.headline: Great Natural Glow for my Melinated Skintone

faceoff_negative.comments: The glotion is a nice enough product. It gives subtle sheen to the skin. Can be used under makeup or alone. I can't say I saw much nut I prrfer a slightly more obvious glow to my face. This would work well for those who don't like much on their skin but a bit of a healthy glow. Good amount of product and no annoying scent
faceoff_negative.headline: Decent Sheen
